item.title: Cyber Security Threat Protection In the Cloud
item.description:
In the past, castles relied on moats to provide extra security beyond their walls. This stopped attackers from directly reaching the castle. Similarly, today’s networks need more than just firewalls. Firewalls are effective but can be overwhelmed. Cloud-based security acts as a modern moat, providing a barrier outside the network. MegaPath’s Unified Threat Management (UTM) uses this approach, offering cloud, on-site, or hybrid security solutions. MegaPath’s UTM is a multi-layered Security as a Service (SaaS) solution that handles simple and complex threats, while also managing security alerts, logs, and compliance...

item.title: Amazon's CloudFront Moves In for Content Delivery
item.description:
Amazon has expanded far beyond bookselling; it’s now a major player in network computing. Recognizing the value of their massive infrastructure, Amazon created Amazon Web Services (AWS) to offer cloud computing resources to businesses of all sizes. AWS includes a range of services, such as Amazon EC2 for computing power, Amazon S3 for storage, and Amazon CloudFront for content delivery.
